/** * StdXMLBuilder is a concrete implementation of IXMLBuilder which creates a * tree of IXMLElement from an XML data source. * * @see net.n3.nanoxml.XMLElement * * @author Marc De Scheemaecker * @version $Name: RELEASE_2_2_1 $, $Revision: 1.3 $ */
